sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"字母"之意。
means: alphabet ：指整个字母系统或一种语言的字母表，不表单个字母。
character ：通常指汉语的方块字，也指字符。

sentence.Network_cn: 只有经过了无数次修改后，约翰才认为剧本写好了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'something written'): shortening of Old French escript, from Latin scriptum, neuter past participle (used as a noun) of scribere 'write'

encyclopedia.content: 脚本，用记事本写的程序代码，通常有VBScript，JAVAScript等，常出现在网页中。Windows Script 是一种 Microsoft Windows 平台下的综合脚本底部结构。Windows Script 提供的脚本引擎、Visual Basic Scripting Edition 和 Microsoft JScript，可以被嵌入到 Windows 应用程序以及用于帮助用户为 Windows 应用程序编写脚本时得到一系列广泛的支持技术。javascript : 主要用于构建动态WEB

entry.tran: (戏剧、电影)剧本;(电视节目)广播稿
entry.def: The script of a play, film, or television programme is the written version of it.

example.tran: 珍妮在写一个电影剧本。

entry.tran: 为(电影等)写剧本;为(广播、电视节目)撰稿
entry.def: The person who scripts a film or a radio or television play writes it.

example.ex: ...James Cameron, who scripted and directed both films.
example.tran: 詹姆斯·卡梅伦，这两部电影的编剧兼导演

entry.tran: (一种语言的)书写系统，字母表
entry.def: You can refer to a particular system of writing as a particular script .

example.ex: ...a text in the Malay language but written in Arabic script.
example.tran: 一篇使用阿拉伯字母书写的马来语演讲稿

entry.def: If you say that something which has happened is not in the script, or that someone has not followed the script, you mean that something has happened which was not expected or intended to happen.

example.ex: Losing was not in the script...
The game plan was right. We just didn't follow the script.
example.tran: 比赛战术是正确的。只是我们没有照部署去打。

means.word_mean: 1. a written version of a play or other dramatic composition; used in preparing for a performance
3. a particular orthography or writing system
